name: Spicy Peanut Chicken Stir-Fry
author: Hilary
summary: This is a peanutty stir-fry. Serve over rice. If you want more sauce than this recipe makes, do not double the vinegar.
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 3/4-inch pieces
1  red bell pepper, cut into 3/4-inch pieces
directions: Mix chicken broth, soy sauce, cornstarch, sugar, vinegar, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl until sauce is smooth
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat; saute chicken and garlic until chicken is no longer pink in the center, 5 to 10 minutes
Add red bell pepper and saute until slightly tender, about 1 minute
Stir sauce into chicken chicken mixture and cook until thickened, about 1 minute
Stir peanuts into chicken mixture and garnish with green onions
